name: Reacting
description:
The city's air has been toxic since anyone can remember. Anyone alive. You've waited for a hero, but it seems all the heroes are gone. The reactors on the outskirts are a death bomb and going there is suicide.

Yet here you are, at the entrance of the first of four reactors. You can already feel your insides turning. But for some reason, there is this urge.
You've seen countless lives fade. It's time.

WASD/ARROW KEYS - Move

SHIFT - Sprint

SPACE - Jump

LEFT MOUSE/Q - Dash in direction

Cian - Unity things, coding

Yreron - art

Juice Tea - music, sound design
